branchCategory.name: MK
branchCategory.description: <p>Combining compact cylinder size and rotating clamp cylinder, the MK2T cylinder is designed for heavy duty clamping applications, with an available integrated arm that swings out of the way when the cylinder is extended. 90 degree clockwise or counter clockwise is available, and clamping arms with adjustment screw are standard options.&nbsp; MK2T is available in 6 bore sizes from 20mm to 63mm and strokes from 10mm to 50mm.</p>

branchItem.name: MK2T, Swing Clamp Cylinder, Double Guide Type
branchItem.description: <p>Combining compact cylinder size and rotational capability, the MK2T cylinder is designed for heavy duty clamping applications, with an available integrated arm that swings out of the way when the cylinder is extended. 90 degrees clockwise or counter clockwise rotation is available, and clamping arms with adjustment screw are standard options. MK2T is available in 6 bore sizes from 20mm to 63mm and stokes from 10 mm to 50 mm</p>
